[b] - DESCRIPTION -[/b]
texture mod that changes the look & feel of riften.

[b]- INSTALLATION -[/b]
Download with NMM, or Manually place the files in Skyrim Data file.
[/size][/center][center][size=3]
[b]- REQUIREMENTS -[/b]
Skyrim

[b]- PROGRESSION OF MOD -[/b]
I Plan to do a texture mod for every city.[/size][/center]
